TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT claim_number AS CLAIM_NUMBER ,adjuster_name AS CLAIM_ADJUSTER_WHOLE_NAME ,LTRIM(SUBSTR( adjuster_name, 1, INSTR( adjuster_name, ',') - 1)) AS CLAIM_ADJUSTER_LAST_NAME ,LTRIM(SUBSTR( adjuster_name, INSTR( adjuster_name, ',') + 1)) AS CLAIM_ADJUSTER_FIRST_NAME ,top_secret_userid_cd AS CLAIM_ADJUSTER_ID FROM (SELECT b.* ,a.loss_key_claim claim_number ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY a.loss_key_claim ORDER BY a.reinsurance_Ind ,NVL(a.reinsurance_company, '0000') ,a.transaction_dt DESC ) rn ,c.adjuster_name FROM arch.sa_pro_45_7_n_8@earp a ,stage.lk_adjuster_init_po b ,fdw.lk_adjuster_userid c WHERE a.examiner_id = b.adjuster_initials AND a.process_office = b.processing_office_cd AND b.top_secret_userid_cd = c.adjuster_userid and a.transaction_cd like '9%' and a.reinsurance_company is null) WHERE rn = 1

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
